data.message: Why do we have to download messenger I don't want facebook to stalk me or know my location

replies.message: We understand your concerns, Jason. Almost all apps must ask for permissions to run. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about how Messenger actually uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/1vWRvo6  -Ryan
Then why is location on by default when you install the app? Also, how about the ability to turn off notification forever, not just a random amount of time?
Remove or don't even Open The messenger app….is a marketing scam…Shame on Facebook for allow this invasion to Privacy
Why can't the Messenger app be optional?

Hey, Cody. The way you access messages is similar—you'll still easily access messages from the Messenger icon. However, Messenger is a faster and better experience. We've found that people get replies about 20% faster. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1vAIF25  -Kristen
Facebook has repeatedly ignored what users want. It would only take the appearance of reasonably comparable social app to send Facebook the way of MySpace.
Again, I had no complaints whatsoever about the messages feature on the regular Facebook app. Why fix what isn't broken?
I don't want messenger. Please put it back the way it was so I can read my messages. To me, the Facebook app is broken.
Even I don't like messenger. I want the old version back.
We're sorry to hear that, Nazneen. If there's anything we can do to make your Messenger experience more enjoyable, please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/UIRVki. -Sarah
The only way you can make the messenger app what people want is to return it to what it was. I only FB on my computer now. Removed the app completely from my phone. Fixed the problem. :)
